# Zone of Glacial Cold (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a snowball)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** 20-ft. radius

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude half

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC)­, pg. 106

You create a zone of icy cold within the spell’s area, dealing 1d6 points of cold damage per round.
